title: Lauren HB Studio Formation Plate - Small
description: Trained as a sculptor, Lauren HB Studio is inspired by abstract art and the Japanese philosophy of wabi sabi, building her collection at the interplay of art, objects, and design. Made by hand of porcelain clay, then finished with glazes created in-house, each piece is unique and variation is inevitable. 7 1/2 in L x 7 1/2 in W x 1 1/2 in H.
